about_the_game:
Step into the boots (or lack thereof) of a daring cowboy as you take on an exhilarating journey through challenging levels, armed only with your trusty grappling whip. In Grapple Whip, you’ll swing from point to point, collecting gems while dodging deadly traps, spikes, and the ever-dangerous abyss below. Master your whip’s mechanics and make precise moves to progress through each level.

Grapple, Swing, and Soar: Attach your whip to designated points, pull yourself through the air, and let go at the perfect moment to reach new heights. Every level introduces new challenges, requiring you to plan your swings carefully.

Color-Coded Grapple Points: Different grapple points provide unique interactions. Some will propel you with extra speed, while others teleport you to different areas or move you along like a transportation system. Timing is everything—detach at the right moment to avoid danger or reach that elusive gem.

Challenging Obstacles: With rotating spikes, moving platforms, and a bottomless abyss, every swing has high stakes. But don’t worry, falling doesn’t reset your progress—you just need to find your footing and try again.

Smooth Controls: Whether you prefer using a mouse, keyboard, or controller, Grapple Whip offers flexible control options to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience.

Key Features:

  • Grapple-Based Mechanics: Use your whip to swing through levels and master momentum.

  • Unique Puzzle Challenges: Each level introduces new mechanics and grapple points with distinct behaviors.

  • Collect Gems and Progress: Find all the gems in a level to unlock the next, with increasing difficulty.

  • Variety of Obstacles: Avoid spikes, pits, and moving hazards while timing your swings perfectly.

  • Multiple Control Options: Play with mouse, keyboard, or gamepad, adapting the controls to your preference.

  • Vibrant Art Style: Immerse yourself in colorful, dynamic environments as you swing from A to B.

Are you ready to master the art of swinging? Test your reflexes, conquer challenging levels, and swing your way to victory in Grapple Whip!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3632QM CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7500M/7600M Series
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs

name: Grapple Whip

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6300HQ CPU @ 2.30GHz × 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Corporation GM107M [GeForce GTX 960M]
  • Storage: 170 MB available space

short_description: You are a cowboy without legs and uses his grapple whip to move around! Collect all the gems in a level to finish. Use your whip to move from target to target (you can’t walk).
